review: I bought it to enable playing my photo albums on my HD TV, but didn't read the description of Chromecast features in enough detail before ordering it to see that it would not work for this purpose.  I am already able to stream Netflix, etc. without the Chromcast and don't need it for what it currently does.  I haven't even taken it out of the box and won't unless/until it allows me to view my photos on my TV.

review: The Chromecast was easy to install and did work fine when I tested it with Netflix and Youtube.  The reason for only three stars is because you can't cast everything from an ipad or iphone that you can from your laptop.  Also I must have missed this when reading about it before purchase, you cannot cast from a desktop that does not have wifi even though it is on the same network.  That's probably my misunderstanding.  I have both the Chromecast and a Roku box, if I could only have one it would NOT be the Chromecast.
